title: Senior Hearts
description: Savor the magic of Josie Riviera’s sweet and wholesome contemporary romances—exclusively in one collection!Cozy up with your favorite beverage and lose yourself in these joyful “seasoned romance” stories featuring older couples—charming heroes and heroines over 50 who fall in love.Because men and women of all ages have exciting, romantic tales worth reading.This collection includes 3 books:A CHOCOLATE-BOX SUMMER BREEZEWill Emily and Joe find their happily-ever-after in a forgotten summer breeze?A CHOCOLATE-BOX IRISH WEDDINGA woman who wanted more. A man who wanted her. Can they rediscover their love in the seaside town where it all began?1-800-IRELANDA strong minded Irishwoman pursuing her dream. A disillusioned businessman ready to retire. Can two determined people separated by years find true love at the end of a rainbow?
author: Josie Riviera
